dt.patient_target:
SELECT
	person_id       AS    "patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	p21_cdm.person
ORDER BY
	person_id;
dt.gender_target:
SELECT
    person_id       AS    "patient_identifier_value",
    gender_source_value            AS    "patient_gender"
FROM
	p21_cdm.person
ORDER BY
	person_id;
dt.zipcode_target:
SELECT
    per.person_id       AS    "patient_identifier_value",
    loc.zip            AS    "patient_address_postalCode"
FROM
	p21_cdm.person AS per
LEFT OUTER JOIN
  p21_cdm.location AS loc ON
  per.location_id = loc.location_id
ORDER BY
	person_id;
dt.birthdate_target:
SELECT
    person_id       AS    "patient_identifier_value",
    year_of_birth  AS    "patient_birthDate"
FROM
	p21_cdm.person
ORDER BY
	person_id;
dt.encounter_target:
SELECT
	person_id       AS    "encounter_subject_patient_identifier_value",
  visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value"
FROM
  p21_cdm.visit_occurrence
ORDER BY
  person_id;
dt.encounterstart_target:
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  visit_start_date  AS    "EpisodeOfCare_period_start"
FROM
  p21_cdm.visit_occurrence
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.encounterend_target:
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  visit_end_date  AS    "EpisodeOfCare_period_end"
FROM
  p21_cdm.visit_occurrence
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.ageindays_target:
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  observation_source_value::numeric          AS    "encounter_subject_patient_age_days"
FROM
  p21_cdm.observation
WHERE
  observation_concept_id = 4265453 AND unit_concept_id = 8512
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.ageinyears_target:
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  observation_source_value::numeric          AS    "encounter_subject_patient_age_years"
FROM
  p21_cdm.observation
WHERE
  observation_concept_id = 4265453 AND unit_concept_id = 9448
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.admission_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  observation_source_value        AS    "encounter_hospitalization_admitSource"
FROM
  p21_cdm.observation
WHERE
  observation_type_concept_id = 43542355 AND observation_concept_id IN (4164916, 4194310, 4138807, 4216316, 4079617, 4146925, 4123917)
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.hospitalization_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  observation_source_value        AS    "encounter_hospitalization_class"
FROM
  p21_cdm.observation
WHERE
  observation_type_concept_id = 43542355 AND observation_concept_id NOT IN (4164916, 4194310, 4138807, 4079617, 4146925, 4123917)
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.discharge_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  observation_source_value        AS    "encounter_hospitalization_dischargeDisposition"
FROM
  p21_cdm.observation
WHERE
  observation_concept_id IN (433128, 4021968, 4049607, 4052193, 4053230, 4082735, 4084500, 4084686, 4127600, 4139566, 4143443, 4147710, 4185328, 4185329, 4186037, 4203130, 4213258, 4216643, 4274958, 45878214)
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.ventilation_target:
SELECT
  visit_occurrence_id     AS    "procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  observation_source_value::numeric          AS    "procedure_code_coding_code_40617009"
FROM
  p21_cdm.observation
WHERE
  observation_concept_id = 4108449
ORDER BY
	visit_occurrence_id;
dt.condition_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "condition_encounter_identifier_value",
  condition_source_value        AS    "condition_code_coding_code"
FROM
  p21_cdm.condition_occurrence
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.conditioncategory_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "condition_encounter_identifier_value",
	condition_type_concept_id       AS    "condition_category_encounter_diagnosis"
FROM
  p21_cdm.condition_occurrence
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.procedure_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  procedure_source_value        AS    "procedure_code_coding_code"
FROM
  p21_cdm.procedure_occurrence
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.proceduredate_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  procedure_date  AS    "procedure_performedDateTime"
FROM
  p21_cdm.procedure_occurrence
ORDER BY
  visit_occurrence_id;
dt.provider_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  care_site_id         AS    "encounter_serviceProvider_type_Organization_name"
FROM
	p21_cdm.visit_occurrence
ORDER BY
	visit_occurrence_id;
dt.providerstart_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  visit_start_date  AS    "encounter_period_start"
FROM
	p21_cdm.visit_occurrence
ORDER BY
	visit_occurrence_id;
dt.providerend_target:
SELECT
	visit_occurrence_id     AS    "encounter_identifier_value",
  visit_end_date    AS    "encounter_period_end"
FROM
	p21_cdm.visit_occurrence
ORDER BY
	visit_occurrence_id;
